subtitle.translate: Of course there would be a questline about Create...

description: I bet you heard about /6/Create/6/ mod. It is awesome. Or not, depending on what you like in minecraft mod. As any other mod it is not essential to progress this pack, since it is not an expert pack.
But avoiding /6/Create/6/ in this pack would be suboptimal. It has a lot of addons in this pack, incluing ore extraction vein and in general nice to have to start a game.

Create is one on addons that isn't fully blocked from moving items, so you can use it for moving item, breaking and placing blocks, etc. Just take a note that using CC:T for this is much more efficient, especially for item transfer. But you still can use only bronze funnel and tunnel.

Since there is no chute, you can't craft item portable interface and extracting items from Create contraptions seems impossible. But worry, not, it is possible! You can use entity link from UnlimitedPeripheralWorks for wireless contraption access. To bind entity card to contraption, just stay close to it, hold wrench in the left hand and use right click while crouching
